script.text: 那天晚上大家都喝了一点白酒，走路去了学校附近的一家酒吧。音乐很响，灯很暗。矮中买了第一轮酒。王崩站在角落里，手里拿着一杯啤酒，看起来很酷。小黑在王崩附近跳舞——不是跟他跳，但够近了。清清坐在桌子旁边，喝着可乐，看着矮中在人群里走来走去。小李一个人在跳舞。
script.en: That night everyone had some baijiu and walked to a bar near campus. Music loud, lights dim. 矮中 buys the first round. 王崩 stands in the corner holding a beer, looking effortlessly cool. 小黑 dances near 王崩 -- not with him, but close enough. 清清 sits at a table, nursing a Coke, watching 矮中 move through the crowd. 小李 dances alone.

script.text: 对话一：酒吧里 (At the Bar)
script.en: Dialogue 1: At the bar.

script.text: 矮中五分钟内已经跟旁边桌的中国女生们聊上了。他买了一轮酒。他的中文很烂但他的energy很有感染力。
script.en: Within five minutes, 矮中 is already chatting up the Chinese girls at the next table. He buys a round. His Chinese is terrible but his energy is infectious.

script.zh: 他就打算一直站在那里吗？
他靠着墙。女生在看他。他什么都不做。
他就是这样的。他越不做什么，看起来越酷。
我想去跟他说话但是走过去太desperate了。
我是说爱你的那种说法。
他请我吃了那顿饭，我觉得无聊。我不喜欢他。你可以放心。

script.text: 清清看着她。胸口的什么东西松了。她没有说谢谢。但小李知道。
script.en: 清清 looks at her. Something in her chest loosens. She doesn't say thanks. But 小李 knows.

script.text: 对话二：一个小时以后 (One Hour Later)
script.en: Dialogue 2: One hour later.

script.text: 矮中三杯酒下去了。他想去跟小李说话。走到她面前。嘴巴张开。什么都说不出来。她在跳舞，根本没看到他站在那里。她从他旁边跳过去了，像他是家具一样。
script.en: 矮中 is three drinks in. He wants to talk to 小李. Walks up to her. Opens his mouth. Nothing comes out. She's dancing, doesn't even see him standing there. She dances right past him like he's furniture.

script.text: 他转过来。小黑在那里。在跳舞。在看他。她喝了两杯了。被王崩ignore了一晚上了。她想要有人——任何人——看她。
script.en: He turns around. 小黑 is there. Dancing. Looking at him. She's two drinks in. 王崩 has ignored her all night. She wants someone -- anyone -- to see her.

script.text: 她走了。很快。
script.en: She leaves. Fast.

script.text: 对话三：门外 (Outside the Bar)
script.en: Dialogue 3: Outside the bar.

script.zh: 我知道不算。这就是问题。
我的第一次被亲。结果是drunk的、sloppy的、不是给我的。
我没有。我不知道怎么做……这些事。
但你是……你。你想要谁就能有谁。
我不想要"谁都行"。所以从来没……
……你不说台湾的时候其实人挺好的。

script.text: 对话四：酒吧里——矮中和清清 (Inside — Ai Zhong and Qingqing)
script.en: Dialogue 4: Inside the bar -- 矮中 and 清清.

script.text: 矮中在吧台。刚才的high全没了。
script.en: 矮中 at the bar. The buzz is completely gone.

script.text: 这时候，酒吧那边，怪老师来了。穿着太年轻的衬衫。一个人。跟一个年轻的中国女生聊天。身体前倾。笑。买酒。那个女生看起来politely不舒服。她拿了酒。走了。怪老师转向下一个。
script.en: Meanwhile, across the bar, 怪老师 shows up. Wearing a shirt too young for him. Alone. Chatting up a young Chinese girl. Leaning in. Laughing. Buying drinks. The girl looks politely uncomfortable. She takes the drink. Walks away. 怪老师 moves on to the next one.

script.zh: 我不是故意的。我想跟小李说话但是说不出来，然后小黑就……在那里。
你看他？那个跟他说话的女生？她对他没兴趣。她只对他的钱有兴趣。
王崩说这就是十五年后的我。他说得对。我来酒吧，跟女生说话，买酒，以为她们喜欢我。其实她们只是喜欢……新鲜感。或者free drinks。
也许。但你还年轻。你可以改。
清清。你为什么对我好？别人都觉得我是笑话。
……我觉得你是一个很努力假装是另一个人的人。真实的那个可能更好。

script.text: 怪老师站起来了。那个女生挽着他的手臂。她一直在看他的手表、手腕。他在笑。她也在笑。他们往出口走。
script.en: 怪老师 stands up. The girl takes his arm. She keeps glancing at his watch, his wrist. He's smiling. She's smiling. They walk toward the exit.

script.text: 大家看着他们走了。
script.en: Everyone watches them leave.

script.text: Ch 14: 越来越 — more and more
script.en: Ch 14: 越来越 -- more and more

script.text: 她喝得越来越多了。= She's drinking more and more.
script.en: 她喝得越来越多了 = She's drinking more and more.

script.text: 怪老师的私信越来越过分了。= Guai's DMs are getting more and more excessive.
script.en: 怪老师's DMs are getting more and more excessive.

script.text: Ch 15: 把 — disposal/result
script.en: Ch 15: 把 -- disposal/result

script.text: 她把手机放下了。= She put down her phone.
script.en: 她把手机放下了 = She put down her phone.

script.text: Ch 15: V过 — ever done something
script.en: Ch 15: V过 -- ever done something

用一个人填补另一个的空

grammarNotes.title: 越来越 — more and more
grammarNotes.body:
她喝得越来越多了。= She's drinking more and more.
怪老师的私信越来越过分了。= Guai's DMs are getting more and more excessive.

grammarNotes.title: 把 — disposal/result
grammarNotes.body:
他把外套脱下来。= He took off his jacket.
她把手机放下了。= She put down her phone.
Note: 把 emphasizes what happened to the object.

grammarNotes.title: V过 — ever done something
grammarNotes.body:
我没亲过任何人。= I've never kissed anyone.
你去过club吗？= Have you ever been to a club?
